import React,{useState} from 'react'; import './Log.css' import user_icon from './person.png' import email_icon from './email.png' import password_icon from './password.png' const Log = () => { const [action,SetAction]= useState("Login"); return (
{action}
{action==="Login"?
:
}
{action==="Sign Up"?

Forgot Password Click here
}

{SetAction("Login" )}}>Login
) } export default Log
